examples:
SELECT * FROM table_name; -- 查詢所有資料
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table_name; -- 查詢特定欄位的資料
SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE column1 = 'value'; -- 使用條件查詢資料
SELECT * FROM table_name LIMIT 10; -- 限制查詢的結果數量
name: SELECT

examples:
INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES ('value1', 'value2'); -- 插入一筆資料
INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2) VALUES ('value1', 'value2'), ('value3', 'value4'); -- 插入多筆資料
name: INSERT

examples: UPDATE table_name SET column1 = 'new_value' WHERE column2 = 'value'; -- 更新資料
name: UPDATE

examples: DELETE FROM table_name WHERE column1 = 'value'; -- 刪除資料
name: DELETE

examples: CREATE TABLE table_name (column1 TEXT, column2 INTEGER, column3 REAL); -- 建立一個資料表
name: CREATE TABLE

examples: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS table_name; -- 刪除資料表
name: DROP TABLE

examples:
ALTER TABLE table_name ADD COLUMN new_column TEXT; -- 新增欄位
ALTER TABLE table_name RENAME TO new_table_name; -- 更改資料表名稱
name: ALTER TABLE

examples: CREATE INDEX index_name ON table_name (column1); -- 建立索引
name: CREATE INDEX

examples: DROP INDEX index_name; -- 刪除索引
name: DROP INDEX

examples:
PRAGMA user_version; -- 查詢資料庫版本
PRAGMA table_info(table_name); -- 查看資料表結構
name: PRAGMA

examples:
SELECT * FROM table1 INNER JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id; -- 內部聯結查詢
SELECT * FROM table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id; -- 左外部聯結查詢
SELECT * FROM table1 RIGHT JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id; -- 右外部聯結查詢
name: JOIN

examples:
SELECT column1, COUNT(*) FROM table_name GROUP BY column1; -- 使用 GROUP BY 進行分組
SELECT * FROM table_name ORDER BY column1 ASC; -- 升冪排序
SELECT * FROM table_name ORDER BY column1 DESC; -- 降冪排序
name: GROUP BY & ORDER BY
